title: What are the different forms of art? - Quora

response.answer_text: These can be also be art: Paintings- Traditional, On walls and many other forms come under painting.Performance Arts- Theatre and its type, Dance and its type, Music and its typeArchitecture and its typeSculptingPhotographyPotteryFilmsLiterature and many many more forms of art exist that we might not even be aware of. For every region has its way of expression.

Art is everything and everywhere. On the societal level, and the categorized art can be: Paintings- Traditional, On walls and many other forms come under painting.Performance Arts- Theatre and its type, Dance and its type, Music and its typeArchitecture and its typeSculptingPhotographyPotteryFilmsLiterature and many many more forms of art exist that we might not even be aware of. For every region has its way of expression.
